overview: Martin Fornage was the first Hardware Engineer at Advanced Fiber Communications where he designed a large variety of modules ranging from power supplies to Fiber optics through wireline and RF communications. He eventually led the Hardware Engineering group there. After AFC, Martin started a consulting firm providing system and assembly level design services to AFC, Cerent, Cisco, Calix and other companies. Martin brings a wealth of practical experience designing high reliability, high volume and cost effective electronics susceptible to be deployed in harsh environments. He co-founded Enphase Energy with Mr. Belur in March of 2006. Martin received his “Ingenieur diplome d’etat” degree from ENSEA, France in 1985.
